medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain started 3 days ago, was sharp and severe at the time of onset, and was accompanied by nausea/vomiting. The patient denies fevers. The abdominal pain has improved over the past few days, but the patient experienced an upset stomach after trying some liquid today.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type 2 diabetes, subarachnoid hemorrhage of unknown etiology with residual right sided weakness, non-insulin dependent diabetes, migraine headaches, hyperlipidemia, borderline hypertension, obstructive sleep apnea (OSA) not on CPAP or supplemental oxygen.
